qas.question: What 4 areas of the country did Columbia Records have manufacturers in?

answers.text: Los Angeles; Terre Haute, Indiana; Bridgeport, Connecticut; and Pitman, New Jersey

qas.question: Chinese Record Productions was operating four plants by what year?
Which company was operating five plants around the US?
The four plants were located in California, Iowa, Connecticut, and where?
By 1972, Columbia Record Productions was operating how many plants?

context: By <b1_0>1962<b1_0/>, their <b2_0>Columbia Record Productions<b2_0/> unit was operating <b4_0>four<b4_0/> plants around the United States located in <a0_0>Los Angeles; Terre Haute, Indiana; Bridgeport, Connecticut; and Pitman, <b3_0>New Jersey<b3_0/><a0_0/>, which manufactured records for not only Columbia's own labels, but also for independent record labels.
